name: Project Homeless Connect
description: Free one-stop access to services, care coordination, and housing navigation
fullDescription: Project Homeless Connect organizes community events and ongoing services connecting people experiencing homelessness with essential resources and care.
whatTheyOffer:
- Large community resource events
- Ongoing care coordination
- Free haircuts and hygiene items
- Medical and dental care referrals
- Legal services
- Benefits enrollment assistance
- Housing navigation
howToGetIt:
1. Attend Project Homeless Connect events
2. Visit their service hub for ongoing support
3. Access free services without appointment
4. Connect with case managers
5. Receive referrals to housing and benefits
